## Data exploration & summarizing in R

```{r}
# set up code chunk
library(tidyverse)
library(skimr)
library(GGally)
View(diamonds)
names(diamonds)
dim(diamonds)
summary(diamonds)
head(diamonds)
tail(diamonds)
skimr::skim(diamonds)
```

```{r}
# creating a pairplot
GGally::ggpairs(diamonds)

```

```{r}
ggplot(data = diamonds, aes(x = carat, y = price,)) +
  geom_point(color = "coral")
geom_jitter()

```

```{r}
ggplot(data = diamonds, aes(x = carat)) +
  geom_histogram(fill ="blue")
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = diamonds, aes(x = clarity, y = price)) +
  geom_boxplot()
```
